name: BMO MSCI Global ESG Leaders Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of an environmental, social and governance (ESG) focused global equity markets index, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the MSCI World ESG Leaders Index (the Index). The investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in assets such as ETFs, mutual funds or other investment funds, American depositary receipts (ADRs) or derivative instruments. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF. As an alternative to or in conjunction with primarily investing in assets such as ETFs, mutual funds or other investment funds, ADRs or derivative instruments, the ETF may invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index.

fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
